mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_CONTRACT_DETAIL (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
contract_id ,
contract_detail_id ,
contract_no ,
ass_id ,
ass_no ,
ass_spec ,
ass_model ,
ass_brand ,
fac_id ,
fac_no ,
contract_amount ,
contract_price ,
send_date ,
keep_repair_times ,
times_unit ,
is_fix ,
is_accept ,
is_bid ,
note ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{contract_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
ASS_CONTRACT_DETAIL_SEQ.nextval ,
#{contract_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{ass_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{ass_spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_model,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{fac_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{fac_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{contract_amount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{contract_price,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{send_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{keep_repair_times,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{times_unit,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{is_fix,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{is_accept,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{is_bid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)

INSERT INTO ASS_CONTRACT_DETAIL (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
contract_id ,
contract_detail_id ,
contract_no ,
ass_id ,
ass_no ,
ass_spec ,
ass_model ,
ass_brand ,
fac_id ,
fac_no ,
contract_amount ,
contract_price ,
send_date ,
keep_repair_times ,
times_unit ,
is_fix ,
is_accept ,
is_bid ,
note ,
) select ASS_CONTRACT_DETAIL_SEQ.nextval , t.* from(
select
#{item.group_id},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.hos_id},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.copy_code},jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.contract_id},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.contract_detail_id},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.contract_no},jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.ass_id},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.ass_no},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.ass_spec},jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.ass_model},jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.ass_brand},jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.fac_id},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.fac_no},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.contract_amount},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.contract_price},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.send_date},jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{item.keep_repair_times},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.times_unit},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.is_fix},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.is_accept},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.is_bid},jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.note},jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
from dual
)t
mapper.select: SELECT distinct a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.contract_id, a.contract_detail_id, a.contract_no, a.ass_id, a.ass_no, an.ass_code, an.ass_name, a.ass_spec, a.ass_model, a.ass_brand, a.fac_id, a.fac_no, h.fac_name, a.contract_amount, a.contract_price, a.send_date, a.keep_repair_times, a.times_unit, a.is_fix, a.is_accept, a.is_bid, a.note FROM ASS_CONTRACT_DETAIL a left join ass_no_dict an on a.group_id=an.group_id and a.hos_id=an.hos_id and a.ass_id=an.ass_id and an.is_stop=0 left join hos_fac h on a.group_id=h.group_id and a.hos_id=h.hos_id and a.fac_id=h.fac_id WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.contract_id = #{contract_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.contract_detail_id = #{contract_detail_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, ass_id, ass_no, ass_spec, ass_model, ass_brand, fac_id, fac_no, sum(contract_amount) contract_amount FROM ASS_CONTRACT_DETAIL where group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND contract_id in (${contract_ids}) group by group_id,hos_id,copy_code,ass_id,ass_no,ass_spec,ass_model,ass_brand,fac_id,fac_no
